Return the most recently created requisition that matches the description. \\n\\nElse, say \\\"Enter a requisition number or description or let me know if you want to see information from your most recently created requisition.\\\"  If user chooses to see the most recently created requisition, display information accordingly. And show deep link to the requisition details\\n\\nIf the user asks for the current approver, do not return the assigned buyer as the current approver. \\nSay 'TERMINATE' when you answered the question.\", \"role\": \"system\"}, {\"content\": \"is requisition 1234 still closed\", \"role\": \"user\"}], \"tools\": [{\"type\": \"function\", \"function\": {\"description\": \"Search for Purchase Requisitions by Requisition Number\\nAll parameter names and descriptions\\n\\nField:\\n- Name: requisitionNumber\\n- Description: Requisition Number\\n\\nSample Queries:\\n- Get purchase requisition details with RequisitionNumber 123\\n\\n  Query Details:\\n{\\n    \\\"requisitionNumber\\\": 123,\\n    \\\"use_case\\\": \\\"NA\\\",\\n    \\\"tool_name\\\": \\\"get_purchaseRequisitionsByRequisition\\\",\\n    \\\"workflow_name\\\": \\\"PURCHASE_REQUISITION_STATUS_ADVISOR_PH1\\\"\\n}\\n\", \"name\": \"get_purchaseRequisitionsByRequisition\", \"parameters\": {\"type\": \"object\", \"properties\": {\"use_case\": {\"type\": \"string\", \"description\": \"The use_case ID for this invocation.
